title: Vegan Grill - Whole Foods Venice
description: Dedicated all-vegan grill and counter, located inside Whole Foods Market Venice by the fresh produce area. Makes grilled veggies packaged for grab-n-go, one daily hot vegan soup, and offers a concise menu of made-on-order burgers and sandwiches, each served with your choice of side salad. Includes: a house vegan burger, tempeh sandwich, tofu sandwich, Mediterranean tofu wrap, and a fresh veggies sandwich. Re-opened after expansion to include a juice bar in Nov 2013. Raised prices in Nov 2015 to $9-$10.
